entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FontImageSource in Button and ImageButton doesn't display properly #23191
  • Bad performance while using OData client vs using HttpClient on Android #23185
  • Color.FromHsla only returns white color #23180
  • Play a local video on Android in MAUI app #23179
  • AppIcon not displayed for Android 7 #23178
  • TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped fired multiple times on Android when GestureRecognizers were changed after rendering. #23177
  • FlexLayout Items (such as buttons, labels and so, etc) Padding not Working #23175
  • TabbedPage doesn't change icon colour #23174
  • Image is flickering after ImageSource change #23172

Closed

  • The Comma Seperator is disabled on the Samsung Numeric keyboard. #22761
  • NavHost cannot be null on Back key pressed #15102
    Backlog
  • MAUI projects with an ampersand in the name can't be built or loaded #21090
  • Improper Insert Behavior on ListView for Windows #22393
    Backlog
  • Add Manual Test to Validate the ScrollView behavior of our templates #17801
    Backlog
  • [net8.0] [iOS] Memory leak on page with CollectionView #23032
  • Memory leak with Shell Navigation #22313
    Backlog
  • XAMLC error in .NET 9 Preview 5 #22975
    9.0-preview6
  • iOS PopModalAsync causes memory leaks #21453
    .NET 8 SR7
  • Is "UseMauiCompatibility()" to port from Xamarin.iOS to MAUI fully functional? #20075
  • CollectionView only measure first item on Windows #15468
  • TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped fired multiple times on Android when GestureRecognizers were changed after rendering. #23176
  • Unable to compile iOS Binding Library #23162
  • Width value return -1 #23171
  • Button - Pressed VisualState not setting ImageSource or Custom Properties #8471
  • `StackLayout` in `RefreshView` expands outside of the screen bounds #9371
  • Failed to AOT compile while building iOS IPA and using Microsoft.Maui.Essentials NuGet package in a class library #15104
  • ListView Items Not Taking Full Width of the Screen #17654
  • When both relative layout width and height constraint is set, child layout is not getting focused. #15910
  • NavigationPage throws unknown null reference error despite being null #22878
  • Unable to control SafeArea of a ContentPage which is inside of a shell #22858
  • Autofac.Core.DependencyResolutionException Error in .Net Maui Blazor. #22970
  • iOS: CollectionView Crashes when clearing ObservableCollection & adding data second time onwards #22949

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove duplicated CarV/ColV galleries #23190
  • [Windows] Fix horizontal scroll not working w/ CollectionView #23188
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, area-controls-scrollview
  • Call base.OnResume if Existing NavigationFragment Early #23187
  • Obsolete Frame for NET9 in favor of Border #23184
    t/docs 📝, area-controls-frame
  • [Android] fix TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped fired multiple times on Android #23183
    community ✨
  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181

Merged

  • Optimize resetting gesture recognizers #19987
    community ✨, stale, area-gestures
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in TabbedPage #23166
    memory-leak 💦
  • warnings ignored on compatability #23189
  • Bump to Android 34.0.113 #23120
    area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • NavHost cannot be null on Back key pressed - fix #23170
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui templates #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • [ci] Set OfficialBuildId when building asset manifests #23102
    area-infrastructure
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [ios/catalyst] fix more cycles in `NavigationPage` #23164
    memory-leak 💦
  • Fixed all remaining CA1416 errors #22868
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-core-platform
  • [XC] Produce warning when x:DataType is inherited from outer scope of `DataTemplate` #22803
    area-xaml

Updated

  • Wire RefreshView up to our xplat layout workflow #23169
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fixes #18204 border lagging behind content on iOS and improves initial render performance #23156
    community ✨
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Add mapper for IsSwipePagingEnabledProperty on Android #23129
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
